attributes.action: Brexit,all UK passport holders living in the EU be given the right to vote.
attributes.background: In 2016,the referendum on Brexit,UK passport holders in the EU were denied the right to vote.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about voting rights for UK citizens living in the EU, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you're concerned about voting in any future EU referendum or voting more broadly.

There's already a petition about UK citizens voting in any future EU referendum which you might like to sign. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/273250
